content: I've turned DyckWord into a structure as per the comments and have just finished "porting" the code to the new representation. Please review
I've split off #14162 which is the whole file up to the definition of semilength. Hopefully I can get this part merged quicker!
@Yaël Dillies you said you're free today; can you please review #14162?
We started sailing earlier than expected so I am on a boat in the Baltic sea with a laptop with three hours and a bit of charge for the entire trip. Not sure I'll be able to review your PR
@Yaël Dillies addressed your comments on #14162
It's in the backlog, don't worry :wink:
